messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If it pleases you, may I challenge you
to a battle?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Bravo! Your technique is impeccable
for someone so young.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Hahaha! I was invited by the master of
the Pokémon Mansion.He’s promised to show me through
his prized garden of Pokémon.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
If it pleases you, would you care for
a rematch with me?
